Ngo Xuan Huy

    Introduction

    I obtained a double master’s degree in Security and Cloud Computing from Aalto University in Finland and EURECOM in France in 2022. My master’s thesis was about the Internet-of-Things Security. The thesis was completed under the co-supervision of professor Janne Lindqvist from Aalto and professor Aurélien Francillon from EURECOM.

    During my study, I spent a year with the cybersecurity research team at Nokia Bells Lab in Finland and a few months during the summer in the S3 research group

    Prior to that, I had a few years of experience as a mobile engineer in Vietnam, where I maintained the Samsung Notes app and released its apk for Galaxy series M.

    I am a Vietnamese citizen who got a bachelor degree in Information Technology from Hanoi University of Science and Technology

    Besides Engish, I understand basic French, Finnish, and Korean.
